title: Trump Misstates Facts in State of the Union Regarding Charlotte Murder
summary: Trump's claim about the suspect in a Charlotte murder case is false; the suspect was a U.S. citizen, not someone who crossed open borders.
charlotte_impact: Misinformation from national figures can distort local realities and fuel political narratives.
